CONCLUSION: Violation of Article 6 - Right to a fair trial (Article 6 - Enforcement proceedings;Article 6-1 - Access to court);Violation of Article 1 of Protocol No. 1 - Protection of property (Article 1 para. 1 of Protocol No. 1 - Peaceful enjoyment of possessions)
JUDGES: Branko Lubarda;Georgios A. Serghides;Pere Pastor Vilanova
TEXT: CARDINAL . The applicant was born in DATE and lives in GPE .

CARDINAL . On DATE ORG of FAC ( “ the ORG ” ) ordered , inter alia , the head of the respondent military institute to re - calculate the period of the applicant ’s service , applying the favourable terms of such calculation for a specified period of service . The applicant was also awarded some additional allowances and payments for certain periods .
CARDINAL . The judgment came into force on DATE .
CARDINAL . On DATE ORG issued a writ of execution . On DATE the bailiffs’ service instituted the enforcement proceedings .
CARDINAL . On DATE the enforcement proceedings were terminated and the writ of execution was returned to the applicant , as the debt could not be recovered .

CARDINAL . On DATE the head of the respondent military institute issued Order No . CARDINAL requiring to make payments in accordance with the judgment of DATE . However , no calculations or payments were made at that time .
CARDINAL . On DATE the applicant submitted the writ of execution to ORG .

CARDINAL . On CARDINAL DATE the writ was returned to the applicant on the ground that the judgment obliged an official of an organisation to take certain actions rather than ordered to recover payments from a budgetary organisation . Thus , the writ of execution was to be submitted to the bailiffs’ service .
CARDINAL . On an unspecified date in DATE the applicant submitted the writ of execution to the bailiffs’ service .

CARDINAL . On DATE the writ of execution was returned to the applicant from the bailiffs’ service without enforcement . The bailiffs explained that for the applicant to be able to receive the payments under the judgment , he should obtain a writ of execution stating the sum of the debt to be recovered . After that , the writ could be submitted to ORG for enforcement .

CARDINAL . In DATE in accordance with Order No . CARDINAL , the defendant military institute calculated the amounts due to the applicant as follows : the compensation for the supplementary ration for the period from DATE until DATE MONEY ( RUB ) ; allowance for special regime of the service in DATE – RUB CARDINAL ; and special allowance – RUB CARDINAL . In total : RUB CARDINAL .
